channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- HiGame, SkyTone
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei Technologies Co., Ltd. -- HiGame, SkyTone

item.title: CVE-2017-2709|2024-08-05T14:02:07.641Z -- huawei%20technologies%20co.%2C%20ltd. -- higame%2C%20skytone
item.description: HiGame with software earlier than 7.3.0 versions, SkyTone with software earlier than 8.1.1 versions have a DoS Vulnerability. An attacker tricks a user into installing a malicious application on the smart phone, the attacker can send malformed packets to the device. Due to the lack of adequate input validation of APPs, which causes the APPs Denial of Service.
